title: jmri-json-throttle-server-message
description: Data portion of message from JMRI to client for type "throttle"

rosterEntry.description: ID of RosterEntry for the throttle

F0.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F1.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F2.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F3.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F4.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F5.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F8.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F11.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F12.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F13.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F14.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F15.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F16.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F17.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F18.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F19.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F20.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F21.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F22.description: true if function on; false otherwise

F23.description: true if function on; false otherwise

speedSteps.description: Number of steps between idle and full throttle

clients.description: Number of clients attempting to control the throttle

name.description: The identity of this throttle used for communications between JMRI server and client

throttle.description: The identity of this throttle used for communications between JMRI server and client; deprecated in favor of "name"

release.description: Message indicates that this throttle has been released from this client
